text: Margaret Dumont (October 20, 1882 – March 6, 1965) was an American actress. Her earlier name was Daisy Juliette Baker. She acted in seven Marx Brothers’s movies and two of Wheeler and Woosley's movies. She played Mrs. Foster in What a Way to Go! Dumont played Harriet in Stop, You're Killing Me. Dumont was born in Brooklyn, New York. She died of a heart attack, age eighty-two, in Hollywood, California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:1882 births Category:1965 deaths
title: Margaret Dumont
